edu.unc.ils.mrc.hive2.api
Interface HiveIndex

All Known Implementing Classes:
HiveH2IndexImpl, HiveLuceneIndexImpl
public interface HiveIndex

Interface for Hive vocabulary indexes. Each Hive my be represented by one or more underlying indexes (e.g., Lucene, Lucene-autocomplete, H2, KEA, etc).

Method Summary
 void addConcept(HiveConcept concept)
          Add a concept to the index
 void commit()
          Commits changes to the underlying index
 void createIndex()
          Create the index
 long getNumConcepts()
          Returns the number of concepts in the index

          Remove a concept from the index
 void startTransaction()
          Starts a transaction in the underlying index
 void updateConcept(HiveConcept concept)
          Update an existing concept in the index
